name: StylesClub
overview:
StylesClub is a social network for shopping on Facebook. The StylesClub Facebook app allows you to receive personalized product recommendations, see what fashion and beauty items your friends and style icons like, and receive personalized sales and exclusive deals alerts.

StylesClub was founded in May, 2011 in Berlin, Germany.

StylesClub is Unique

Unlike other online fashion communities, StylesClub realizes the untapped potential of adding social data attributes to product categorization. This allows StylesClub to generate the most accurate product recommendations to shoppers and to produce more relevant ways for members to browse products online â€“ based on age group, city and other social product characteristics as opposed to just brand, color, product subtype, etc.
